briefdescription.para: DEPRECATED Used for explosive traps to prevent detonation after destroying through disarm action.

inbodydescription.para: timer calling OnUpdate in configured interval

briefdescription.para: this event is called all variables are synchronized on client
also called from RPC on client

simplesect.para: NON-MANAGED, will be managed by C++ once it is sent to the CommandHandler through Human.StartCommand_Script

So ideally, it is best to set up the HumanCommandScript, not create any instances and start it through Human.StartCommand_ScriptInst In case an instance needs to be created, it needs manual deletion if not sent to the CommandHandler But deleting it while it is in the CommandHandler will cause crashes constructor must have 1st parameter to be Human virtual to be overridden called when command starts

briefdescription.para: DEPRECATED Set if trap can be disarmed using ActionClapBearTrapWithThisItem.

inbodydescription.para: carscript specific handling (not all traps are uses this)
actual, healthy wheel, let it pass
